name: Last Shot Area
description:
LAST SHOT AREA is mixed with Battle Royale and Turn Base Gameplay.

Story: 5 Players fight until DEAD in a small town. And to survive, the player needs to find items hidden in crates around the town.

The last one who survives will take all rewards.

Featuring:
- 3 Modes to play: Free Fire / Captain Mode / Hidden Role
- Diverse Hero Pool: Each hero has their unique skill to take advance of winning. Unlock a new hero when you have enough reward.
- Various weapons: not only gun work in battle but there are also a lot of weapons with different usage. You can also collect parts of a weapon to craft an ultimate weapon.
- Multiple platforms: Enjoy the game with your friends on both mobile / pc and web.

We recommend playing the game on pc/mac/android but you also can play on  web  through: https://www.facebook.com/292studio/

The game was developed by 292Studio.
